product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: PIPE SUPPORTS (FROM MATERIALS SUPPLIED BY CONTRACTOR) :- Fabrication, erection (at all elevations) of pipe supports like shoes, cradles,  hangers, clamps(of all sizes/thicknesses manufactured by forming method using die), turn buckles, saddles, guides,  special supports, pads(including corrosion pads & protection shields),providing and welding of stiffeners as per drawings, T post etc. of all types including supply and   application one coat of primer, all necessary equipments, consumables,labour, and completing work as per drawings, specifications and instructions of Engineer-in-charge. Modifications/rectifications, if required; and  adjustment/ alignment during precommisioning, commisioning as per the instructions of Engineer-in-charge. Fabrication of extension of spindle for valves, provision of locking arrangement, etc. shall also be considered under this item.

PIPE SUPPORTS (FROM MATERIALS SUPPLIED BY CONTRACTOR) :- Fabrication, erection (at all elevations) of pipe supports like shoes, cradles,  hangers, clamps(of all sizes/thicknesses manufactured by forming method using die), turn buckles, saddles, guides,  special supports, pads(including corrosion pads & protection shields),providing and welding of stiffeners as per drawings, T post etc. of all types including supply and   application one coat of primer, all necessary equipments, consumables,labour, and completing work as per drawings, specifications and instructions of Engineer-in-charge. Modifications/rectifications, if required; and  adjustment/ alignment during precommisioning, commisioning as per the instructions of Engineer-in-charge. Fabrication of extension of spindle for valves, provision of locking arrangement, etc. shall also be considered under this item.
product_entries.full_product_description: MODIFICATION/EXTRA WORKS (IF ANY) :- Cutting, bevelling, fitup, welding of different sizes of CS/AS/SS/Higher Alloy piping of all types and thicknessess in shop, in position, on ground/overhead on rack and at all elevations; transportation of pipes, fittings, flanges etc from owner's storage point to work site/ work shop, making necessary scaffoldings, consumables, machinery, tools, tackles, labour andsupervision including attending repairs for completing the work as per the instruction of Engineer-in-charge.
product_entries.core_product_name: modification or extra works for piping
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: carbon steel, alloy steel, stainless steel, higher alloy

Modifications/rectifications, if required; and  adjustment/ alignment during precommisioning, commisioning as per the instructions of Engineer-in-charge. product_entries.full_product_description: REMOVAL ERECTED PIPING(ABOVE GROUND) :- Removal of piping existing/ erected including SW valves for modification as required as per Drawings/P&IDs/instructions of Engineer-in-charge at all elevations, including providing assistance to owner for draining, cleaning and purging of the lines to be removed , unbolting of flanged joints /cutting of pipe lines wherever required, installation of flanges and blind flanges, removal of insulation from insulated lines, removing supports, steam tracers, all fittings and flanges, instruments etc, cutting of pipes in appropriate length for transporting purposes, cleaning, flushing, drying and transporting all materials to storage point(within the complex battery limits) designated by Owner/EIL including stacking of material and disposing of waste etc as instructed by Engineer-in-charge.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: feature: includes removal of sw(valves), flanges, insulation, supports, steam tracers, fittings, instruments, cleaning, flushing, drying, transporting, stacking, disposing of waste

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: PIPE SUPPORTS (FROM MATERIALS SUPPLIED BY CONTRACTOR) :- Fabrication, erection (at all elevations) of pipe supports like shoes, cradles,  hangers, clamps(of all sizes/thicknesses manufactured by forming method using die), turn buckles, saddles, guides,  special supports, pads(including corrosion pads & protection shields),providing and welding of stiffeners as per drawings, T post etc. of all types including supply and   application one coat of primer, all necessary equipments, consumables,labour, and completing work as per drawings, specifications and instructions of Engineer-in-charge. Modifications/rectifications, if required; and  adjustment/ alignment during precommisioning, commisioning as per the instructions of Engineer-in-charge. Fabrication of extension of spindle for valves, provision of locking arrangement, etc. shall also be considered under this item.

product_entries.full_product_description: OPENING & BOXING-UP OF PIPING / EQUIPMENT FLANGES & BLINDING OF FLANGESJOINTS: Box-up of flange joints with or without Blinds by providing required scaffoldings / temporary supports / mechanical jacks at all locations and elevation, engaging manpower, tools & tackles, tightening  Torque wrench/ Tensioner ( wherever torque tightening is required ), lapping Paste,   including issuing and transportation of bolts, nuts and gaskets and from owner store, cleaning of mating surfaces of flanges, lapping of flanges where ever required,  removal of temporary gaskets / studs, nuts / test blinds installed by others and completing the work in all respect as per specification, drawing and instruction of owner / engineer in charge.)
product_entries.core_product_name: opening and boxing-up of piping or equipment flanges and blinding of flanges joints
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: feature: box-up of flange joints with or without blinds, includes scaffoldings, temporary supports, mechanical jacks, torque wrench, tensioner, lapping paste, bolts, nuts, gaskets, cleaning, lapping, removal of temporary gaskets, studs, nuts, test blinds

original_rows.3: MODIFICATION/EXTRA WORKS (IF ANY) :- Cutting, bevelling, fitup, welding of different sizes of CS/AS/SS/Higher Alloy piping of all types and thicknessess in shop, in position, on ground/overhead on rack and at all elevations; transportation of pipes, fittings, flanges etc from owner's storage point to work site/ work shop, making necessary scaffoldings, consumables, machinery, tools, tackles, labour andsupervision including attending repairs for completing the work as per the instruction of Engineer-in-charge.
FLAME   CUTTING C.S PIPING  IBR/NON IBR
HACKSAW CUTTING C.S PIPING  IBR/NON IBR
FITUP & WELDING  C.S PIPING  IBR/NON IBR

REMOVAL ERECTED PIPING(ABOVE GROUND) :- Removal of piping existing/ erected including SW valves for modification as required as per Drawings/P&IDs/instructions of Engineer-in-charge at all elevations, including providing assistance to owner for draining, cleaning and purging of the lines to be removed , unbolting of flanged joints /cutting of pipe lines wherever required, installation of flanges and blind flanges, removal of insulation from insulated lines, removing supports, steam tracers, all fittings and flanges, instruments etc, cutting of pipes in appropriate length for transporting purposes, cleaning, flushing, drying and transporting all materials to storage point(within the complex battery limits) designated by Owner/EIL including stacking of material and disposing of waste etc as instructed by Engineer-in-charge.

REMOVAL OF ERECTED VALVES (ABOVE GROUND) :- Removal of all types and ratings ofvalves by unbolting, cutting etc. as required, cleaning by flushing with water/air etc. as  required  and transportation of the same to Owner's storage point (within thecomplex battery limits) and stacking as per instructions of Engineer-in-Charge.
LOW FRICTION PADS: Supply, fabrication and fixing of low friction pads with suitable bonding materials / fasteners, as specified in Drawings / Isometrics / Special support sketches.
TEFLON PAD WITH COMPRESSIVE STRENGTH (0.25 OFFSET) :1870 PSI
GRAPHITE PAD WITH COMPRESSIVE STRENGTH : 2877 PSI

OPENING & BOXING-UP OF PIPING / EQUIPMENT FLANGES & BLINDING OF FLANGESJOINTS: Box-up of flange joints with or without Blinds by providing required scaffoldings / temporary supports / mechanical jacks at all locations and elevation, engaging manpower, tools & tackles, tightening  Torque wrench/ Tensioner ( wherever torque tightening is required ), lapping Paste,   including issuing and transportation of bolts, nuts and gaskets and from owner store, cleaning of mating surfaces of flanges, lapping of flanges where ever required,  removal of temporary gaskets / studs, nuts / test blinds installed by others and completing the work in all respect as per specification, drawing and instruction of owner / engineer in charge.)
